com.capgemini.cobigen.impl.config.upgrade

Class AbstractConfigurationUpgrader<VERSIONS_TYPE extends Enum<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.capgemini.cobigen.impl.config.upgrade.AbstractConfigurationUpgrader<VERSIONS_TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    VERSIONS_TYPE - Type of the version enum listing all supported versions (increasing declaration).
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContextConfigurationUpgrader, TemplateConfigurationUpgrader

    public abstract class AbstractConfigurationUpgrader<VERSIONS_TYPE extends Enum<?>>
extends Object
    This class encompasses all logic for upgrading CobiGen configurations including
    • detection of all released schema compatibilities
    • upgrading legacy configurations to the latest supported version

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods

      Checks, whether the configuration is compliant to the latest supported version.

      Upgrades the given configuration to the latest supported version.
      VERSIONS_TYPE resolveLatestCompatibleSchemaVersion(Path configurationRoot)
      Checks, whether the configuration can be read with an old schema version.

    • Method Detail

      • isCompliantToLatestSupportedVersion

        public boolean isCompliantToLatestSupportedVersion(Path configurationRoot)
        Checks, whether the configuration is compliant to the latest supported version.
        Parameters:
        configurationRoot - the root folder containing the configuration
        Returns:
        true if the configuration is up-to-date,
        otherwise false

      • resolveLatestCompatibleSchemaVersion

        public VERSIONS_TYPE resolveLatestCompatibleSchemaVersion(Path configurationRoot)
        Checks, whether the configuration can be read with an old schema version.
        Parameters:
        configurationRoot - the root folder containing the configuration
        Returns:
        the newest schema version, the configuration is compliant with or null if the configuration is not compliant to any.

      • upgradeConfigurationToLatestVersion

        public boolean upgradeConfigurationToLatestVersion(Path configurationRoot,
                                                   BackupPolicy backupPolicy)
        Upgrades the configuration to the latest supported version.
        Parameters:
        configurationRoot - the root folder containing the configuration with the specified configurationFilename. See AbstractConfigurationUpgrader(Enum, Class, String) for more information.
        backupPolicy - the BackupPolicy to choose if a backup is necessary or not.
        Returns:
        if manual adoptions has to be performed after upgrading
        Throws:
        BackupFailedException - if the backup could not be created

      • performNextUpgradeStep

        protected abstract ConfigurationUpgradeResult performNextUpgradeStep(VERSIONS_TYPE source,
                                                                     Object previousConfigurationRootNode)
                                                              throws Exception
        Upgrades the given configuration to the latest supported version.
        Parameters:
        source - version from which to upgrade to the latest version.
        previousConfigurationRootNode - JAXB configuration root node of the configuration to be upgraded
        Returns:
        ConfigurationUpgradeResult, which contains the JAXB root node of the upgraded configuration. Further it contains a flag to indicate manual adoptions to be necessary after upgrading.
        Throws:
        Exception - Any exception thrown during processing will be wrapped into a CobiGenRuntimeException by the AbstractConfigurationUpgrader with an appropriate message. NotYetSupportedExceptions will be forwarded untouched to the user.
